name: Stellar Rogue
description:
Explore the cruel and savage Planet Myanus!!!

Play as "The Lonely Bounty Hunter" Marc Skyripper and slay all stinky aliens that get in your way!!!

  • Not so interesting backstory
  • Hardcore gameplay (No shit)
  • Armory (Customization)
  • 4 Short Levels (Short does't mean it easy)
  • 2 Savage Bosses
  • Stinky aliens all over the places that trying to kill you
  • Hidden collectibles
  • and many more (I don't know what else to write here)

(I forgot to put instruction in the game, so I put it here)

  • Move : Left/A and Right/D
  • Jump : Spacebar
  • Shoot : Left Mouse Button / L Ctrl
  • Use Gadget : Right Mouse Button / L Alt
